# About eodhd

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

[EODHD](https://eodhd.com/) is a private company that offers access to a set of comprehensive and high quality repositories of  financial data for over 70+ exchanges accross the world. 

# Features

- cache
- quota management


## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# not yet in CRAN
#install.package("eodhd2")

# development version
devtools::install_github("msperlin/eodhd2")
```


## Authentication

```{r}
eodhd2::set_token()
```

## Usage

```{r}
ticker <- "AAPL"
exchange <- "US"

df_fin <- eodhd2::get_fundamentals(ticker, exchange)

names(df_fin)
```
